attributes.action: Keep our children safe from predators & paedophiles in New Tredegar
attributes.additional_details: Asking for support in keeping our children safe from people that are posed as a high risk of danger to children. There is a male living in the new tredegar area that poses a risk to children and as I found out from social services has been grooming my daughter to build up a child's trust. If we all stand together we can remove people from these from our community where our children have a right to be able to go out to play...
